name: prognostication
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a judgment or the act of making a judgment about what is likely to happen in the future: optimistic economic prognostications his powers of prognostication
medical
  specialized a medical judgment about the likely or expected development of a disease: DNA analysis will help doctors offer better prognostications.
